summary: Iteration 23 - Comprehensive ERP Testing: All 15 features tested. Backend: 32/32 tests PASSED (100%). Frontend: All critical flows verified - Login, CRM (Leads Kanban, Accounts, Quotations, Samples), Inventory (Dashboard, Item Master with tabs), Production (7-stage workflow, Machines, Order Sheets, Work Orders), Field Registry (8 modules), DPR Reports.
seed_data_creation: Used existing data: 1 Order Sheet (OS-20260123-6FAA76), 12 Work Orders across 7 stages, 3 machines, CRM leads/accounts/quotations/samples
context_for_next_testing_agent: All modules working correctly. Field Registry shows 8 modules (CRM, Inventory, Production, Accounts, Procurement, Quality, HRMS, Settings). Production module has 7-stage workflow (Coating, Slitting, Rewinding, Cutting, Packing, Ready to Deliver, Delivered). Work Orders are accessed via /production-stages/work-order/:id not /production-stages/work-orders.

1_login.details: Login with admin@instabiz.com / adminpassword works correctly. Returns token and user object.

2_crm_dashboard.details: CRM Dashboard loads with stats. Navigation to Leads, Accounts, Quotations, Samples all working.

3_crm_leads_kanban.details: Leads page shows Kanban view with stages: New (3), Hot Leads (2), Cold Leads (0), Contacted (0), Qualified (1), Proposal. Pipeline visualization working.

4_crm_customer_accounts.details: Customer Accounts page loads. Add Account form shows dynamic fields from Field Registry with tabs: Basic Info, Addresses, Contacts, Credit & Terms. Customize Fields button links to Field Registry.

5_crm_quotations.details: Quotations page loads. New Quotation form shows all configured fields including customer selection, items, pricing, terms.

6_crm_samples.details: Samples page loads. Create Sample form shows all fields: Customer, Purpose, Dispatch Location, Courier/Transport, Sample Items.

7_inventory_dashboard.details: Inventory Dashboard loads with tabs: Dashboard, Item Master, Warehouses, Stock Balance, Transfers, Approvals.

8_inventory_item_master.details: Item Master tab shows items list. Add Item dialog opens with tabs: Basic Info, Specifications, Pricing & MOQ, Inventory, Custom Fields.

9_production_dashboard.details: Production Control Center loads with 7-Stage Manufacturing Workflow. Summary: 2 Total SKUs, 8995 PCS in Process, 3000 SQM in Process, 3 Machines. Pipeline shows all 7 stages with pending/active counts.

10_production_machines.details: Machine Master page loads with 3 machines: Coating Line 1 - Main, Slitting Machine A, Rewinding Unit 1. Add/Edit machine functionality available.

11_production_order_sheets.details: Order Sheets page loads with existing order sheet (OS-20260123-6FAA76) showing Test Manufacturing Co., 2 items, 0% progress, active status.

12_production_work_orders.details: Work Order Detail page loads showing WO number, product, stage, target/completed/wastage quantities, machine assignment, production entries. Add Production Entry button available.

13_field_registry_8_modules.details: Field Registry shows all 8 modules: CRM, Inventory, Production, Accounts (Finance), Procurement, Quality, HRMS, Settings. Each module has entities that can be configured.

14_field_registry_entity_config.details: Can view and edit fields for different entities. CRM Leads shows Kanban Stages configuration with stages: New, Hot Leads, Cold Leads, Contacted, Qualified, Proposal, Converted, Lost.

15_dpr_reports.details: DPR Reports page loads with tabs: Daily Report, Weekly Trend, Stage Details. Shows summary cards: Total Entries, Work Orders Active, Total Output, Total Wastage, Hours Worked.
